title: Portfolio Site
description: My portfolio site I built with React/Gatsby and hosted on Netlify. Animations were added with Framer Motion.

title: Film Findr
description: A React web app that allows users to search for movies. It uses the TMDB API.

title: Fun Food Friends
description: A React web app that leverages Firebase. It allows users to log what they will bring to a potluck.

title: Book List
description: A simple app built with JavaScript that allows users to keep track of books they're interested in.
